sen.j: 日蓮は四箇格言を掲げて、法華経あるいは南無妙法蓮華経に依らず、邪教に依ると、その報いとして横難や横死に遇うと述べた。
sen.e: Nichiren, advocating Shikakakugen (four dictums blaming other sects), mentioned that if one depends on heresy, not on Hoke-kyo Sutra (the Lotus Sutra) or Nam Myoho Renge-kyo Sutra (Devotion to the Law of Hokekyo), one would encounter onan (横難) or oshi (横死) as retribution for that.
sen.cmt: 用語集では「四箇格言」の英訳に創価学会が出てきますが（four dictums of the Soka Gakkai (Nichiren Buddhism)）、ここは日蓮の時代のことなので、説明を変更しました。「四箇格言」：http://kotobank.jp/word/%E5%9B%9B%E7%AE%87%E6%A0%BC%E8%A8%80 日蓮は「横難横死」を多用した、とありますので、日蓮の文章に漢字を加えました。

sen.e: For example, Nichiren says, 'There is nothing superior to sansho (three norms to be used for discrimination between right and wrong in religion), and thinking of Zenmui and Ichigyo who suffered onan (横難) oshi (横死), and the ways Kukai and Ennin died, I wonder how true practioners of shobo (the true teachings of Buddha) could be like them.'
